parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "Slurm",
  "details": {
    "partition": "mlperf",
    "nodes": 1,
    "wall_time": "12:00:00",
    "job_name": "rnn_translator",
    "memory": "all available",
    "tasks_per_node": 8,
    "threads_per_core": 2,
    "cores_per_socket": 20,
    "benchmark": "rnn_translator",
    "benchmark_name": "GNMT",
    "container": "mlperf-nvidia:rnn_translator",
    "data_dir": "/raid/data/wmt16_de_en",
    "preprocessed_data_dir": "/raid/scratch/gnmt",
    "log_dir": "/raid/results/rnn_translator",
    "number_of_runs": 10,
    "system_specific_parameters": "config_DGX1.sh",
    "docker_volumes": "-v /raid/data/wmt16_de_en:/data -v /raid/results/rnn_translator:/results -v /raid/scratch/gnmt:/preproc_data",
    "docker_execution": "nvidia-docker run --init --rm --net=host --uts=host --ipc=host --ulimit stack=67108864 --ulimit memlock=-1 --name=cont_${SLURM_JOB_ID} --security-opt seccomp=unconfined $IBDEVICES",
    "preprocessed_dataset_generation_command": "python preprocess_data.py --preproc-data-dir /preproc_data --dataset-dir /data --max-length-train ${MAX_SEQ_LEN}",
    "benchmark_run_command": "./run_and_time.sh",
    "environment_variables": [
      "DGXSYSTEM",
      "MULTI_NODE",
      "LR",
      "TRAIN_BATCH_SIZE",
      "TEST_BATCH_SIZE",
      "WARMUP_STEPS",
      "REMAIN_STEPS",
      "DECAY_INTERVAL",
      "TARGET",
      "NUMEPOCHS",
      "MAX_SEQ_LEN",
      "EXTRA_OPTS",
      "SLURM_JOB_ID",
      "SLURM_NTASKS_PER_NODE",
      "SLURM_NNODES"
    ],
    "cache_clearing_command": "sync && sudo /sbin/sysctl vm.drop_caches=3"
  }
}
```
